name: String
Runic Knowledge
passive:
While you have a Magic or Rune weapon equipped, each of your attacks gains:
Surge: Suffer 1 Fatigue to gain +2 Heart.

name: String
Exploding Rune
action: Perform an attack with a Rune weapon. The attack gains Blast.

name: String
Ghost Armor
action: After your defense roll, use this card to add 1 Shield to the results.

name: String
Inscribe Rune
passive: Any weapon you equip gains the Rune trait while equipped.

name: String
Iron Will
passive: Each time you spend 1 Surge during an attack to recover 1 Fatigue, you instead recover 2 Fatigue.

name: String
Rune Mastery
passive: When you attack with a Rune weapon, you may exhaust this card to add 1 Surge to the result.

name: String
Runic Sorcery
action: Perform an attack with a Rune weapon. If this attack deals at least 1 Heart (after rolling defense dice), choose 1 condition. The target suffers the chosen condition.

name: String
Break the Rune
action: Perform an attack with a Rune weapon. This attack ignores range and targets each other figure within 3 spaces and in your line of sight. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: String
Quick Casting
passive: After you perform an attack with a Rune weapon, exhaust this card to immediately perform an additional attack.
